name: Sea of Paintings
description:
Nicolás Alejandro Castillo Velasteguí

Daniel Corzo González

José Manuel Gutiérrez Gutiérrez

Santiago Lete Martín

Marta Zarca

Controlls:

Spacebar to put the Canvas.

A and D to move alongside the Port.

Click to Take an object for the Canvas.

Q and E to rotate.

Shift anda Control to change the axis.

Backspace to erase the object.

Enter to place the object.

F1, F2 and F3 to listen to another instruments.

Have fun!
